column3: This clumsy Mol maiden has broken something fairly important.
Slay three matamata and obtain a matamata matron shell and claw from a matamata matron.
Deliver the matamata matron shell and claw to the Mol maiden.
Please, you have to help me. I have broken the gifts I was supposed to give my soon-to-be husband's family. I need to fix them as soon as possible.
I require a matamata's shell and claw. However, I am incapable of obtaining them myself.
What is more, they must be taken from a matamata matron. A creature which is seldom seen.
Though, there is a way to draw one out into the open. Slay several matamata and one will appear eventually.
I was told to marry my husband by the elder gods themselves. This marriage <Emphasis>must</Emphasis> go ahead.
Slay the matamata to the west and a matron will appear soon enough.
Please bring its shell and a claw back to me. Without those I cannot repair the gifts.
Oh, thank you! I do not know what I would have done without you.
Our tribe is smaller than most. We try to prevent ourselves from becoming alienated from the other tribes by marrying our members with theirs.
It will take a while for me to get used to a life that is not controlled by the elder gods, but I know everything will be fine─it was they who chose this path for me.
Now, it is time I began repairing the gifts. Should our paths cross again someday, I would very much like to introduce you to my new family.
